title: May 16th - The Bitch is Back!! Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: May 16th - The Bitch is Back!! Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Kardashian Family update, Hilary Duff, Dave Chappelle Attack, and Kim Cattrall
description:
The Bitch is back! The Basic and Brain are back in action as Madi joins us virtually from Cairo, Egypt. This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from our usual Kardashian family update to discussing Kim Cattrall's thoughts on "And Just Like That". See below for the topics of the week:


Kardashian Family Update

  • Kanye West Claimed Kim Kardashian Career ‘Was Over’ Amid Their Divorce: He compared her style to Marge Simpson
  • Kourtney Kardashian Reveals She Accidentally Broke Her Engagement Ring from Fiancé Travis Barker
  • Tristan Thompson Sent Kris Jenner A Bouquet Of Flowers For Mother’s Day Months After His Paternity Scandal And Split From Khloé Kardashian


Hilary Duff

  • Hilary Duff’s Nude Magazine Cover Shoot Is Being Compared With Britney Spears’ Naked Instagram Photos After People Pointed Out The Astounding Difference In Reaction


Dave Chappelle Attacked at Netflix is a Joke festival

  • The Same Security Company For Dave Chappelle’s Show Also Oversaw The Deadly Astroworld Festival


Kim Cattrall on "And Just Like That"

  • Kim Cattrall Finally Gave Her Unfiltered Thoughts On “And Just Like That” And Addressed Sarah Jessica Parker’s Comments About Not Wanting Her On The Show




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
